message.body: Lol I forwarded your haiku email to tower yesterday and like everyone is talking about it now :-P
Lol awesome! Probably should've thought of sending it to eating clubs earlier...
Lol if what I heard is true it's the non-student part that's the problem
Oh what do you mean? Do you mean the grad/faculty/staff? Yeah we've had ~5 submissions
My friend in art history just told me he has a lot of grad student friends in the department that would be interested and even ones that are Japanese so I begged him to urge them to participate
Omg thanks! Dude I asked all the other JSA people to do that and none of them did... Oh well hopefully we get some more submissions!! Thanks a million!
Haha np JSA still has a special spot in my heart
